content: page | 1 slippery road ahead mittens aino vikman the sample pair in yellow and dark grey reminded me of a certain road warning sign sooner or later those warnings will be topical again and warm mittens are greatly appreciated the mitten starts with an uncommon but pretty 2-color double chain kihnu troi cast-on it may feel at first a bit tricky but the outcome is well worth the effort the cuff features corrugated ribbing and it is separated from the hand with a 2-color lateral braid aka vits another gem in the estonian knitting heritage a video tutorial is attached for both techniques the thumb gusset was introduced in lehtikeli pattern in this pattern the cuff ribbing is repeated in the thumb wedge and at the palm side of the thumb the gusset increases are done on one side only making the gusset asymmetrical therefore the mittens are different for right and left hand also the colorwork motif is mirrored the floats in the colorwork motif are quite long and they need to be caught the ladderback jacquard lbj method is strongly recommended but any other float catching method will work too the colorwork motif fire is from andrea rangel s book alterknit happy knitting
